message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Alice,  $180 is a bit steep for me.  I'm really interested in this product but my budget is $100. Would you be willing to go lower?

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can see that you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $155. This is my best price for now, but I'm open to negotiating further if you're willing to make a serious offer.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $155 is still above my budget.  I'm happy to go up to $120, which is a fair compromise.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you at $140, which is still a good deal for both of us. Let's see if we can seal the deal.
Alice, $140 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $130, but that's my final offer. Let's see if we can agree.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $130. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $145. This is my last offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
